name: Gray Day (4chan[nel])
description:
- Changes all elements on 4chan pages to grays and black except for text.
- Removes box shadows from all elements that have them.
- Adds additional "Replies," "Images," "Posters," and "Page" text to thread statistics.
- Changes the "Return" link in the catalog to say "Index" instead.
- Makes it so filenames are no longer truncated with "(...)".
- Hides horizontal rules that are no longer necessary when ads are not displayed.
- Includes elements specific to 4chan X.
- Sets border radius to 0 for all 4chan X elements that have a border radius greater than 0.

Intended to be used with the default style setting in which the style is set to Yotsuba or Yotsuba B depending on if the board being browsed is "work safe" or not, and for this reason, text colors have been left untouched to keep the indication of a board's work-safe status intact.

Found something I've missed or displaying incorrectly? Let me know!
additional_info:
- The following edits are in a section of their own section, so they can be easily found and removed if desired:
• New post marker color change.
• Highlight color and focus color disable change.
• Text field autofill color change.
• Hiding of horizontal rules that are no longer necessary when ads are not displayed.
• Removal of box shadows.
• Border radius of 4chan X elements changes.
• Select menus' and text fields' border color and size/padding/position changes.
• Buttons', checkboxes', and radials' appearance changes.
• Change to give "No file chosen" in the Quick Reply window enough space to be displayed completely and other adjustments to account for that.
• Additional "Replies," "Images," "Posters," and "Page" text added to thread statistics.
• Change to "Return" link in the catalog to say "Index" instead.
• Change making it so filenames are no longer truncated.
• Cosmetic changes to CAPTCHA can be found in the section below the section containing the other features in this list.

March 20, 2018:
- Added elements specific to 4chan X. (I personally do not use 4chan X, so it is very possible I missed some things during my short time spent with it. Please let me know if you notice something I did not.)

April 27, 2018:
- Made select menus' and text fields' (when and when not in focus) borders black.
- Made minor cosmetic changes to the Quick Reply window: "No file chosen" text given enough space be to displayed entirely, Spoiler option right-margin added to account for "No file chosen" text change (so it doesn't hug the Post button too closely), and minimum width of text fields changed to account for both changes.
- Made it so full filenames are displayed (no longer truncated with "(...)").

May 5, 2018:
- Changed the "Return" link in the catalog to say "Index" instead.
- Moved several edits to their own section, so they can be easily found and removed if desired.

May 20, 2018:
- Commented out most ad hiding stuff, because it may be causing some freezing issues and the hiding is unreliable anyway because many methods are employed to ensure that ads are displayed. Might revisit later. Any insight would be appreciated.

July 14, 2018:
- Removed box shadows for images in the catalog and added a 1px black border for deleted images in the catalog. This can be found in a separate section with other features, so that it can easily be found and removed if desired.
- Added cosmetic changes for buttons. This can be found in a separate section with other features, so that it can easily be found and removed if desired.
- Added cosmetic changes for CAPTCHA elements (including 4chan X). This can be found in a section of its own, so that it can easily be found and removed if desired.
- Resolved an issue with the incorrect color being used for OP posts when using 4chan X due to an element overlap with mobile.
- Added/updated additional cosmetic changes for 4chan X elements.

discussions.name: Checkbox Checkmark Positioning Inconsistent Between Browsers
